::Shadow Wing::

She caught the figure out of the corner of her eye.  She turned but 
not fast enough.  The blade sliced through her side leaving a two 
inch deep wound. "AHHHHH!"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Killer::
> 
> Prowl glances over at Shadow Wing, a bit annoyed at the 
interruption. "Just 
> fin-WATCH OUT!"
> 
> Killer jumps down from a rock, his sword stabbing down at Shadow 
Wing's back.
